channel.title: 317 delta help
channel.description: Simple question. Since my minning doesn't want to work the way i was coding it in. Does someone know what void or booloean delta uses to click an object and you get something.

item.title: 317 delta help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:6, topic:398225”]If you doing have a mining method in your server, then try putting this in anywhere:

public void mining() { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] { startAnimation(625); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; addItem(438, 1); addSkillXP(10, 14); } }[/quote]

Im Confused!

Read full topic

item.title: 317 delta help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

halflive9:

Oh ok, but in the original deltascape source i think there is a mining method. Maybe u can use that and improve it?

my server dosent have that method. i checked.
can you tell me where i need to place this code?

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon]
			{
			startAnimation(625);
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			addItem(438, 1);
			addSkillXP(10, 14);
			}

Read full topic
